mapper.select: SELECT t.trip_id AS tripId, t.trip_name AS tripName, t.start_date AS startDate, t.end_date AS endDate, t.trip_location AS locationName FROM trip t INNER JOIN trip_member tm ON t.trip_id = tm.trip_id WHERE tm.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY t.start_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRIP (member_id, trip_name, trip_location, start_date, end_date, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{tripName}, #{tripLocation}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
